column4: hello, I just installed Drush using following this tutorial http://openspring.net/tip/how-to-install-drush-serverwide-in-less-than-one-minute however I cannot execute the command drush. I get: -bash: /usr/bin/drush: No such file or directory
as you can see on tutorial, it is not there. I think /usr/bin is only for official packages. However as I created a symlink /usr/local/bin/drush it should be ok to run from any folder, not?
